title: Westwood 1BR 1BA w/ Wood/Carpet/Parking/Fireplace!
posting_body: ['Westwood Spacious 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Apartment!!', 'Please do not visit property without our leasing agent.', 'Thank you!', 'This 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment features wood/carpet flooring, central air and heat, quartz countertops, a gas fireplace, a private balcony and more.', 'Kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator, a dishwasher, a gas range and an oven.', 'Community features include covered parking, an elevator, a garage, a fitness center, a laundry facility, and a pool on the roof of our community.', 'City and Mountain views in select apartment.', 'Extra storage available.', 'Midvale Court is a vibrant apartment community located in Westwood, Los Angeles.', 'We offer thoughtful Studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom floor plans designed with your needs in mind.', 'Nestled South of Wilshire Blvd., you are in close proximity to UCLA, UCLA Medical Center, and Century City.', 'Treat yourself to everyday conveniences immediately outside your front door like Bristol Farms, Sprouts Farmers Market, Ralphs, Target, Trader Joe’s and 99 Ranch Market (Coming 2021).', 'Call us today for more information at:', 'show contact info', '.', 'For more available apartments, visit <URL>/', '1400 Midvale Avenue', 'Westwood, Los Angeles, California, 90024', 'Brentwood, West LA, Beverly Hills', 'This 1 bedroom offers the following amenities:', 'Dishwasher', 'Gas Range And Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Private Balcony', 'Central Air And Heat', 'Gas Fireplace', 'Quartz Countertops', 'Wood/Carpet Floors', 'The building amenities include the following features:', 'Controlled Access', 'Lounge', 'Roof Terrace', 'Fitness Center', 'Assigned Parking', 'Elevator', 'BBQ/Grill Area', 'Spa', 'Pool', 'Laundry Facilities', 'Sauna', 'Disclaimer: Pictures are a representation but may not be of the exact apartment.', 'Advertised unit availability, rental rates, and terms are updated every 24 hours and conditions are subject to change without notice.', 'Please call for latest availability details.']
